channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-2445|2024-08-05T04:21:33.632Z -- sap -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform
item.description: AdminTools in SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence, versions 4.1, 4.2, allows an attacker to manipulate the vulnerable application to send crafted requests on behalf of the application, resulting in a Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-2474|2024-08-05T04:21:34.147Z -- sap -- sap%20fiori%201.0%20for%20sap%20erp%20hcm%20%28approve%20leave%20request%2C%20version%202%29
item.description: SAP Fiori 1.0 for SAP ERP HCM (Approve Leave Request, version 2) application allows an attacker to trick an authenticated user to send unintended request to the web server. This vulnerability is due to insufficient CSRF protection.

item.title: CVE-2018-2435|2024-08-05T04:21:33.642Z -- sap -- sap%20netweaver%20enterprise%20portal
item.description: SAP NetWeaver Enterprise Portal from 7.0 to 7.02, 7.11, 7.20, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, 7.50, does not sufficiently encode user controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-2485|2024-08-05T04:21:34.103Z -- sap -- sap%20fiori%20client
item.description: It is possible for a malicious application or malware to execute JavaScript in a SAP Fiori application. This can include reading and writing of information and calling device specific JavaScript APIs in the application. SAP Fiori Client version 1.11.5 in Google Play store addresses these issues and users must update to that version.

item.title: CVE-2018-2502|2024-08-05T04:21:34.181Z -- sap -- sap%20business%20one%20service%20layer%20%28b1_on_hana%29
item.description: TRACE method is enabled in SAP Business One Service Layer . Attacker can use XST (Cross Site Tracing) attack if frontend applications that are using Service Layer has a XSS vulnerability. This has been fixed in SAP Business One Service Layer (B1_ON_HANA, versions 9.2, 9.3).

item.title: CVE-2018-2492|2024-08-05T04:21:34.186Z -- sap -- sap%20netweaver%20application%20server%20%28java%20library%29
item.description: SAML 2.0 functionality in SAP NetWeaver AS Java, does not sufficiently validate XML documents received from an untrusted source. This is fixed in versions 7.2, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40 and 7.50.

item.title: CVE-2018-2467|2024-08-05T04:21:34.174Z -- sap -- sap%20businessobjects%20bi%20platform%20servers%20%28software%20development%20kit%29
item.description: In the Software Development Kit in SAP BusinessObjects BI Platform Servers, versions 4.1 and 4.2, using the specially crafted URL in a Web Browser such as Chrome the system returns an error with the path of the used application server.

item.title: CVE-2018-2450|2024-08-05T04:21:33.712Z -- sap -- sap%20maxdb%20%28livecache%29
item.description: SAP MaxDB (liveCache), versions 7.8 and 7.9, allows an attacker who gets DBM operator privileges to execute crafted database queries and therefore read, modify or delete sensitive data from database.

item.title: CVE-2018-2473|2024-08-05T04:21:34.148Z -- sap -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform%20server
item.description: SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform Server, versions 4.1 and 4.2, when using Web Intelligence Richclient 3 tiers mode gateway allows an attacker to prevent legitimate users from accessing a service, either by crashing or flooding the service.

item.title: CVE-2018-2462|2024-08-05T04:21:33.906Z -- sap -- sap%20netweaver%20bi
item.description: In certain cases, BEx Web Java Runtime Export Web Service in SAP NetWeaver BI 7.30, 7.31. 7.40, 7.41, 7.50, does not sufficiently validate an XML document accepted from an untrusted source.

item.title: CVE-2018-2433|2024-08-05T04:21:33.652Z -- sap -- sap%20gateway
item.description: SAP Gateway (SAP KERNEL 32 NUC, SAP KERNEL 32 Unicode, SAP KERNEL 64 NUC, SAP KERNEL 64 Unicode 7.21, 7.21EXT, 7.22 and 7.22EXT; SAP KERNEL 7.21, 7.22, 7.45, 7.49 and 7.53) allows an attacker to prevent legitimate users from accessing a service, either by crashing or flooding the service.

item.title: CVE-2018-2451|2024-08-05T04:21:34.168Z -- sap -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: XS Command-Line Interface (CLI) user sessions with the SAP HANA Extended Application Services (XS), version 1, advanced server may have an unintentional prolonged period of validity. Consequently, a platform user could access controller resources via active CLI session even after corresponding authorizations have been revoked meanwhile by an administrator user. Similarly, an attacker who managed to gain access to the platform user's session might misuse the session token even after the session has been closed.

item.title: CVE-2018-2464|2024-08-05T04:21:34.168Z -- sap -- sap%20webdynpro
item.description: SAP WebDynpro Java, versions 7.20, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, 7.50, does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in a stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-2461|2024-08-05T04:21:34.532Z -- sap -- gbx01%20hr
item.description: Missing authorization check in SAP HCM Fiori "People Profile" (GBX01 HR version 6.0) for an authenticated user which may result in an escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2018-2448|2024-08-05T04:21:34.123Z -- sap -- sap%20srm-mdm%20catalog
item.description: Under certain conditions SAP SRM-MDM (CATALOG versions 3.0, 7.01, 7.02) utilities functionality allows an attacker to access information of user existence which would otherwise be restricted.

item.title: CVE-2018-2472|2024-08-05T04:21:34.514Z -- sap -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform
item.description: SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform 4.10 and 4.20 (Web Intelligence DHTML client) does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-2447|2024-08-05T04:21:33.666Z -- sap -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence
item.description: SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence (Launchpad Web Intelligence), version 4.2, allows an attacker to execute crafted InfoObject queries, exposing the CMS InfoObjects database.

item.title: CVE-2018-2452|2024-08-05T04:21:33.712Z -- sap -- sap%20netweaver%20as%20java
item.description: The logon application of SAP NetWeaver AS Java 7.10 to 7.11, 7.20, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, 7.50 does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-2497|2024-08-05T04:21:34.166Z -- sap -- sap%20hana
item.description: The security audit log of SAP HANA, versions 1.0 and 2.0, does not log SELECT events if these events are part of a statement with the syntax CREATE TABLE <table_name> AS SELECT.

item.title: CVE-2018-2439|2024-08-05T04:21:33.655Z -- sap -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20server%20%28igs%29
item.description: The SAP Internet Graphics Server (IGS), 7.20, 7.20EXT, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53, has insufficient request validation (for example, where the request is validated for authenticity and validity) and under certain conditions, will process invalid requests. Several areas of the SAP Internet Graphics Server (IGS) did not require sufficient input validation. Namely, the SAP Internet Graphics Server (IGS) HTTP and RFC listener, SAP Internet Graphics Server (IGS) portwatcher when registering a portwatcher to the multiplexer and the SAP Internet Graphics Server (IGS) multiplexer had insufficient input validation and thus allowing a malformed data packet to cause a crash.

item.title: CVE-2018-2455|2024-08-05T04:21:33.649Z -- sap -- sap%20enterprise%20financial%20services
item.description: SAP Enterprise Financial Services, versions 6.05, 6.06, 6.16, 6.17, 6.18, 8.0 (in business function EAFS_BCA_BUSOPR_SEPA) does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2018-2458|2024-08-05T04:21:33.974Z -- sap -- sap%20business%20one
item.description: Under certain conditions, Crystal Report using SAP Business One, versions 9.2 and 9.3, connection type allows an attacker to access information which would otherwise be restricted.

item.title: CVE-2018-2438|2024-08-05T04:21:33.267Z -- sap -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20server%20%28igs%29
item.description: The SAP Internet Graphics Server (IGS), 7.20, 7.20EXT, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53, has several denial-of-service vulnerabilities that allow an attacker to prevent legitimate users from accessing a service, either by crashing or flooding the service.

item.title: CVE-2018-2505|2024-08-05T04:21:34.371Z -- sap -- sap%20commerce%20%28sap%20hybris%20commerce%29
item.description: SAP Commerce does not sufficiently validate user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in storefronts that are based on the product. Fixed in versions (SAP Hybris Commerce, versions 6.2, 6.3, 6.4, 6.5, 6.6, 6.7).

item.title: CVE-2018-2440|2024-08-05T04:21:34.275Z -- sap -- sap%20dynamic%20authorization%20management%20%28dam%29%20by%20nextlabs%20%28java%20policy%20controller%20versions%29
item.description: Under certain circumstances SAP Dynamic Authorization Management (DAM) by NextLabs (Java Policy Controller versions 7.7 and 8.5) exposes sensitive information in the application logs.

item.title: CVE-2018-2454|2024-08-05T04:21:33.882Z -- sap -- sap%20enterprise%20financial%20services
item.description: SAP Enterprise Financial Services, versions 6.05, 6.06, 6.16, 6.17, 6.18, 8.0 (in business function EAFS_BCA_BUSOPR_2) does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2018-2470|2024-08-05T04:21:34.206Z -- sap -- sap%20netweaver%20application%20server%20for%20abap
item.description: In SAP NetWeaver Application Server for ABAP, from 7.0 to 7.02, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40 and from 7.50 to 7.53, applications do not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-2444|2024-08-05T04:21:34.250Z -- sap -- sap%20businessobjects%20financial%20consolidation
item.description: SAP BusinessObjects Financial Consolidation, versions 10.0, 10.1, does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-2441|2024-08-05T04:21:33.237Z -- sap -- sap%20change%20and%20transport%20system%20%28abap%29
item.description: Under certain conditions the SAP Change and Transport System (ABAP), SAP KERNEL 32 NUC, SAP KERNEL 32 Unicode, SAP KERNEL 64 NUC, SAP KERNEL 64 Unicode 7.21, 7.21EXT, 7.22 and 7.22EXT; SAP KERNEL 7.21, 7.22, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53 and 7.73, allows an attacker to transport information which would otherwise be restricted.

item.title: CVE-2018-2475|2024-08-05T04:21:33.648Z -- sap -- project%20%E2%80%9Cgardener%E2%80%9D
item.description: Following the Gardener architecture, the Kubernetes apiserver of a Gardener managed shoot cluster resides in the corresponding seed cluster. Due to missing network isolation a shoot's apiserver can access services/endpoints in the private network of its corresponding seed cluster. Combined with other minor Kubernetes security issues, the missing network isolation theoretically can lead to compromise other shoot or seed clusters in the "Gardener" context. The issue is rated high due to the high impact of a potential exploitation in "Gardener" context. This was fixed in Gardener release 0.12.4.

item.title: CVE-2018-2432|2024-08-05T04:21:33.601Z -- sap -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20%28bi%20launchpad%20and%20central%20management%20console%29
item.description: SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence (BI Launchpad and Central Management Console) versions 4.10, 4.20 and 4.30 allow an attacker to include invalidated data in the HTTP response header sent to a Web user. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may lead to advanced attacks, including: cross-site scripting and page hijacking.

item.title: CVE-2018-2477|2024-08-05T04:21:34.098Z -- sap -- knowledge%20management%20%28xmlforms%29%20in%20sap%20netweaver
item.description: Knowledge Management (XMLForms) in SAP NetWeaver, versions 7.30, 7.31, 7.40 and 7.50 does not sufficiently validate an XML document accepted from an untrusted source.

item.title: CVE-2018-2504|2024-08-05T04:21:34.413Z -- sap -- sap%20netweaver%20as%20java%20%28servercore%29
item.description: SAP NetWeaver AS Java Web Container service does not validate against whitelist the HTTP host header which can result in HTTP Host Header Manipulation or Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. This is fixed in versions 7.10, 7.11, 7.20, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, 7.50.

item.title: CVE-2018-2481|2024-08-05T04:21:34.036Z -- sap -- sap_aba
item.description: In some SAP standard roles, in SAP_ABA versions, 7.00 to 7.02, 7.10 to 7.11, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, 7.50, 75C to 75D, a transaction code reserved for customer is used. By implementing such transaction code a malicious user may execute unauthorized transaction functionality.

item.title: CVE-2018-2491|2024-08-05T04:21:33.921Z -- sap -- sap%20fiori%20client
item.description: When opening a deep link URL in SAP Fiori Client with log level set to "Debug", the client application logs the URL to the log file. If this URL contains malicious JavaScript code it can eventually run inside the built-in log viewer of the application in case user opens the viewer and taps on the hyperlink in the viewer. SAP Fiori Client version 1.11.5 in Google Play store addresses these issues and users must update to that version.

item.title: CVE-2018-2442|2024-08-05T04:21:33.652Z -- sap -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence
item.description: In SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence, versions 4.0, 4.1 and 4.2, while viewing a Web Intelligence report from BI Launchpad, the user session details captured by an HTTP analysis tool could be reused in a HTML page while the user session is still valid.

item.title: CVE-2018-2489|2024-08-05T04:21:34.150Z -- sap -- sap%20fiori%20client
item.description: Locally, without any permission, an arbitrary android application could delete the SSO configuration of SAP Fiori Client. SAP Fiori Client version 1.11.5 in Google Play store addresses these issues and users must update to that version.

item.title: CVE-2018-2466|2024-08-05T04:21:33.933Z -- sap -- sap%20data%20services
item.description: In Impact and Lineage Analysis in SAP Data Services, version 4.2, the management console does not sufficiently validate user-controlled inputs, which results in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-2460|2024-08-05T04:21:34.095Z -- sap -- sap%20business%20one%20android%20application
item.description: SAP Business One Android application, version 1.2, does not verify the certificate properly for HTTPS connection. This allows attacker to do MITM attack.

item.title: CVE-2018-2431|2024-08-05T04:21:34.117Z -- sap -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20suite
item.description: SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Suite, versions 4.10 and 4.20, does not sufficiently encode user controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-2459|2024-08-05T04:21:34.097Z -- sap -- sap%20mobile%20platform
item.description: Users of an SAP Mobile Platform (version 3.0) Offline OData application, which uses Offline OData-supplied delta tokens (which is on by default), occasionally receive some data values of a different user.

item.title: CVE-2018-2469|2024-08-05T04:21:33.621Z -- sap -- sap%20adaptive%20server%20enterprise%20%28ase%29
item.description: Under certain conditions SAP Adaptive Server Enterprise (ASE), versions 15.7 and 16.0, allows an attacker to access information which would otherwise be restricted.

item.title: CVE-2018-2463|2024-08-05T04:21:34.044Z -- sap -- sap%20hybris%20commerce
item.description: The Omni Commerce Connect API (OCC) of SAP Hybris Commerce, versions 6.*, is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF) attacks. This is due to a misconfiguration of XML parser that is used in the server-side implementation of OCC.

item.title: CVE-2018-2478|2024-08-05T04:21:33.607Z -- sap -- sap%20basis%20%28trex%20%2F%20bwa%20installation%29
item.description: An attacker can use specially crafted inputs to execute commands on the host of a TREX / BWA installation, SAP Basis, versions: 7.0 to 7.02, 7.10 to 7.11, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40 and 7.50 to 7.53. Not all commands are possible, only those that can be executed by the <sid>adm user. The commands executed depend upon the privileges of the <sid>adm user.

item.title: CVE-2018-2482|2024-08-05T04:21:34.116Z -- sap -- sap%20mobile%20secure%20android%20application
item.description: SAP Mobile Secure Android Application, Mobile-secure.apk Android client, before version 6.60.19942.0, allows an attacker to prevent legitimate users from accessing a service, either by crashing or flooding the service. Install the Mobile Secure Android client released in Mid-Oct 2018.

item.title: CVE-2018-2490|2024-08-05T04:21:34.156Z -- sap -- sap%20fiori%20client
item.description: The broadcast messages received by SAP Fiori Client are not protected by permissions. SAP Fiori Client version 1.11.5 in Google Play store addresses these issues and users must update to that version.

item.title: CVE-2018-2471|2024-08-05T04:21:34.150Z -- sap -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform
item.description: Under certain conditions SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform 4.10 and 4.20 allows an attacker to access information which would otherwise be restricted.

item.title: CVE-2018-2483|2024-08-05T04:21:33.909Z -- sap -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform
item.description: HTTP Verb Tampering is possible in SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform, versions 4.1 and 4.2, Central Management Console (CMC) by changing request method.

item.title: CVE-2018-2457|2024-08-05T04:21:34.337Z -- sap -- sap%20adaptive%20server%20enterprise
item.description: Under certain conditions SAP Adaptive Server Enterprise, version 16.0, allows some privileged users to access information which would otherwise be restricted.

item.title: CVE-2018-2437|2024-08-05T04:21:34.111Z -- sap -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20server%20%28igs%29
item.description: The SAP Internet Graphics Service (IGS), 7.20, 7.20EXT, 7.45, 7.49, 7.53, allows an attacker to externally trigger IGS command executions which can lead to: disclosure of information and malicious file insertion or modification.

item.title: CVE-2018-2503|2024-08-05T04:21:34.355Z -- sap -- sap%20netweaver%20as%20java%20%28servercore%29
item.description: By default, the SAP NetWeaver AS Java keystore service does not sufficiently restrict the access to resources that should be protected. This has been fixed in SAP NetWeaver AS Java (ServerCore versions 7.11, 7.20, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, 7.50).

item.title: CVE-2018-2416|2024-08-05T04:21:33.228Z -- sap -- sap%20identity%20management
item.description: SAP Identity Management 7.2 and 8.0 do not sufficiently validate an XML document accepted from an untrusted source.

item.title: CVE-2018-2479|2024-08-05T04:21:34.148Z -- sap -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform%20%28biworkspace%29
item.description: SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform (BIWorkspace), versions 4.1 and 4.2, does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-2449|2024-08-05T04:21:33.631Z -- sap -- sap%20supplier%20relationship%20management%20master%20data%20management%20catalog
item.description: SAP SRM MDM Catalog versions 3.73, 7.31, 7.32 in (SAP NetWeaver 7.3) - import functionality does not perform authentication checks for valid repository user. This is an unauthenticated functionality that you can use on windows machines to do SMB relaying.

item.title: CVE-2018-2446|2024-08-05T04:21:33.622Z -- sap -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence
item.description: Admin tools in SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence, versions 4.1, 4.2, allow an unauthenticated user to read sensitive information (server name), hence leading to an information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2018-2500|2024-08-05T04:21:34.512Z -- sap -- sap%20mobile%20secure%20for%20android
item.description: Under certain conditions SAP Mobile Secure Android client (before version 6.60.19942.0 SP28 1711) allows an attacker to access information which would otherwise be restricted.

item.title: CVE-2018-2488|2024-08-05T04:21:34.155Z -- sap -- sap%20fiori%20client
item.description: It is possible for a malware application installed on an Android device to send local push notifications with an empty message to SAP Fiori Client and cause the application to crash. SAP Fiori Client version 1.11.5 in Google Play store addresses these issues and users must update to that version.

item.title: CVE-2018-2486|2024-08-05T04:21:33.893Z -- sap -- sap%20marketing%20%28uicuan%29
item.description: SAP Marketing (UICUAN (1.20, 1.30, 1.40), SAPSCORE (1.13, 1.14)) does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-2468|2024-08-05T04:21:34.032Z -- sap -- sap%20adaptive%20server%20enterprise%20%28ase%29
item.description: Under certain conditions the backup server in SAP Adaptive Server Enterprise (ASE), versions 15.7 and 16.0, allows an attacker to access information which would otherwise be restricted.

item.title: CVE-2018-2494|2024-08-05T04:21:34.075Z -- sap -- sap%20basis%20%28as%20abap%20of%20sap%20netweaver%29
item.description: Necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges, have been fixed in SAP Basis AS ABAP of SAP NetWeaver 700 to 750, from 750 onwards delivered as ABAP Platform.

item.title: CVE-2018-2434|2024-08-05T04:21:33.594Z -- sap -- sap%20netweaver%20%28ui_infra%29
item.description: A content spoofing vulnerability in the following components allows to render html pages containing arbitrary plain text content, which might fool an end user: UI add-on for SAP NetWeaver (UI_Infra, 1.0), SAP UI Implementation for Decoupled Innovations (UI_700, 2.0): SAP NetWeaver 7.00 Implementation, SAP User Interface Technology (SAP_UI 7.4, 7.5, 7.51, 7.52). There is little impact as it is not possible to embed active contents such as JavaScript or hyperlinks.

item.title: CVE-2018-2465|2024-08-05T04:21:33.819Z -- sap -- sap%20hana
item.description: SAP HANA (versions 1.0 and 2.0) Extended Application Services classic model OData parser does not sufficiently validate XML. By exploiting, an unauthorized hacker can cause the database server to crash.

item.title: CVE-2018-2427|2024-08-05T04:21:33.218Z -- sap -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20suite
item.description: SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Suite, versions 4.10 and 4.20, and SAP Crystal Reports (version for Visual Studio .NET, Version 2010) allows an attacker to inject code that can be executed by the application. An attacker could thereby control the behaviour of the application.

item.title: CVE-2018-2487|2024-08-05T04:21:34.082Z -- sap -- sap%20disclosure%20management
item.description: SAP Disclosure Management 10.x allows an attacker to exploit through a specially crafted zip file provided by users: When extracted in specific use cases, files within this zip file can land in different locations than the originally intended extraction point.

item.title: CVE-2018-2476|2024-08-05T04:21:34.120Z -- sap -- sap%20netweaver%20%28forums%29
item.description: Due to insufficient URL Validation in forums in SAP NetWeaver versions 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, an attacker can redirect users to a malicious site.

item.title: CVE-2018-2436|2024-08-05T04:21:33.805Z -- sap -- sap%20r%2F3%20enterprise%20retail
item.description: Executing transaction WRCK in SAP R/3 Enterprise Retail (EHP6) does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges.
